author: mmusich
body:
It was noticed in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47859 that despite there were errors in the logs (see [here](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-724d13/45600/hlt-p2-integration.log)), the bot still marked it as successful, see [here](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-724d13/45600/summary.html).
I add a check for errors in the log now and mark the PR tests as failure in case the bot finds any.
title: check for errors in the `hlt-p2-integration.log`
